In the account, that the Los Angeles Times describes as one about`` shifting blame and settling scores'', Donald Rumsfeld writes that President Bush never asked him whether invading Iraq was the right course to take. While President Bush and I had many discussions about the war preparations, I do not recall his ever asking me if I thought going to war with Iraq was the right decision, he writes.
